description.value: The slime that makes up your body has healing properties. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} without @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]{Healer's Toolkit} as long as you have a free pseudopod and choose to lose 1 Hit Point as part of the check to Administer First Aid or Treat Wounds. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} feat, you can do so with Battle Medicine as well. When using your slime for any of these actions, you gain a +1 item bonus to the skill check. This increases to +2 at 9th level and +3 at 17th level.
